p: Determination of SOD activity was performed according of Misra and Fridovich with slight modifications [ 20]. Characterization of SOD isoforms was performed using KCN (2 mM), which inhibits Cu/Zn-SOD or H 2O 2 (5 mM), affecting both Cu/Zn-SOD and Fe-SOD whereas Mn-SOD was insensitive to both inhibitors [ 21].
